#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
int main(void)
{
char month[][12]={"January","Feburary","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"};
char str[10]={'\0'};
int date,year;
scanf("%d%s%d",&date,str,&year);
int i=0,sum;
while(strcmp(month[i++],str)!=0);
int x=date*i+year;
while(x/10!=0)
{
sum=0;
while(x)
{
sum=sum+x%10;
x=x/10;
}
x=sum;
}
printf("%d\n",x);
return 0;
}
